title: Hour 1 - Deshaun Watson Decision Is Coming, Avalanche Roll
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Deshaun Watson Decision Is Coming, Avalanche Roll
description:
Dan describes the predicament the Browns find themselves in as Deshaun Watson faces NFL discipline, and he talks about the Colorado Avalanche winning the Stanley Cup.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
